full_summary:
================================================================================================

**Request for Proposal: TBIPS Application/Software Architect**

**Solicitation Number:** W6952-24-024
**Publication Date:** June 16, 2023

The Department of National Defence invites pre-qualified suppliers to submit proposals for the services of an Application/Software Architect, Level 3, under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) contract.

**Scope of Work:**
The selected contractor will provide configuration and documentation services for server maintenance requirements for the Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) application residing on Shared Services Canada (SSC) servers.

**Number of Contracts:**
One (1) contract will be awarded for a period of 36 months, commencing on approximately August 15, 2023.

**Location of Work:**
The contractor will work remotely and on-site, with the primary location being National Defence Headquarters, 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2.

**Security Requirements:**
The contractor must have a Secret security clearance and adhere to the Common PS SRCL #22 List of Verification Security Requirements.

**Pre-Qualified Suppliers:**
The following companies are pre-qualified to bid on this requirement:

1. Adirondack Information Management Inc.
2. Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc. and Excel Human Resources Inc. in Joint Venture
3. C3SA CYBERNETIC SECURITY AUDIT INC.
4. Cistel Technology Inc.
5. Computer Sciences Canada Inc./Les sciences de l'informatique Canada Inc.
6. Coradix technology Consulting Ltd.
7. HELM'S DEEP CONSULTING CORP., MESSA COMPUTING INC., THINKPOINT INC. in Joint Venture
8. I.M.P. Group Limited
9. MALARSOFT TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION, COMPUTACENTER TERAMACH INC. in Joint Venture
10. Michael Wager Consulting Inc.
11. Onaki Création S.E.N.C., IBISKA TELECOM INC. in Joint Venture
12. Pricewaterhouse Coopers LLP
13. Promaxis Systems Inc.
14. S.I. SYSTEMS ULC
15. The Halifax Computer Consulting Group Inc.

**Contact Information:**
For inquiries, please contact:

* Nancy Pelchat
* Phone: (343) 544-8890
* Email: admdiaprocurement-approvisionnementsmadia@forces.gc.ca
